main.description: Storage via ATProto PDS blobs for WebDataset tar archives. Used in ac.foundation.dataset.record storage union for maximum decentralization.

blobs.description: Array of blob entries for WebDataset tar files

blobEntry.description: A single PDS blob shard with optional integrity checksum

blob.description: Blob reference to a WebDataset tar archive

checksum.description: Content hash for integrity verification (optional since PDS blobs have built-in CID integrity)
